message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $80 to us, but I'm open to discussing a fair price. Let's start with $95. Looking forward to your response!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $90?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. While we're open to negotiation, I believe the value of the product justifies a slightly higher price. How about we consider $92 as a compromise?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $92. Would you be willing to meet me at $86?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering the value of our product, how about we aim for $88 as a compromise?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $88. Would you be willing to meet me at $84?
Thank you for your patience, Bob. Considering the quality and uniqueness of our product, how about we agree on $86 as a fair price?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $86. Would you be willing to meet me at $83?
I understand your position, Bob. Given the value of our product, I propose we settle on $84 as a fair price.
